summary.span: 命名空間 (Namespace) 為使用 Managed 程式碼指定會影響 Common Language Runtime 執行階段行為的中繼資料 (Metadata) 屬性 (Attribute) 的編譯器撰寫者，提供功能。

span.span: The namespace provides functionality for compiler writers who use managed code to specify attributes in metadata that affect the run-time behavior of the common language runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空間主要是供編譯器撰寫者，雖然有幾個其類別，例如，各式各樣的應用程式中使用。This namespace is primarily for compiler writers, although several of its classes, such as , are used in a wide variety of applications.
